cleaned_text: Park Grand Opening The Bark in the Park dog park grand opening event is Wednesday, Sept. 13 from 5 - 7 p.m. The new park is at the northwest corner of Bassett Creek Park at 32nd Ave. N. and Brunswisk Ave., 6029 32nd Ave. N. The new park is larger with separate areas for small and large dogs. It includes plenty of shade, paved trails and expanded parking. [Read More about Bassett Creek
